## ChainProCluster.createWithdrawIntent() method

Creates an intent to withdraw from a cluster

**Signature:**

```typescript
createWithdrawIntent(withdrawAmount: bigint, network: TokenNetwork, destinationAddress: string): Promise<PostUsersIntentsRes>;
```
